QuestData.Title: They Call Him... Stormstout
QuestData.Description: Things were not always like this, $r. Oh no, they were much, much worse. Not three weeks ago, we were under siege by saurok bandits. They stole our jade, befouled our food stores, and terrorized our cubs.$b$bWe needed a hero, and a hero arrived.$b$bHe drove back their forces, defeated their leader, and returned our stolen jade. All he asked in return was a serpent ride for his niece.$b$bI was never able to thank him. If you are headed to the Valley of the Four Winds, would you relay our thanks?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Chen Stormstout at the Thunderfoot Fields in the Valley of the Four Winds.
